name: VR Futuristic Car Race- Turbo Car Games Free
name_original: VR Futuristic Car Race- Turbo Car Games Free
description:
You ever wanted to be the fastest future jet spaceship racer. Well now you can!! It is an endless driving game with lots of twists and turns. And the best part of this game is that it is based on one of the best technology of this building area- Virtual Reality. Start your exciting journey, cross the bullying, collect the powers and space rings coming in your way. The airway journey is very difficult and dangerous. You need to save yourself from the obstacles. The more you will play and survive, the more difficulty levels are going to come. So just fasten your seat belt and go racing.
Pick your wanted spaceship jet and join the extreme racing challenge. Race in different thrilling environments from green to futuristic nitro racer roads in moto vr and become a fast and furious street racer champion. Challenge yourself and beat your high score. Turbo racer jet will give you thrill of dodging the buildings at insane speed all you have to do is take control and drive your real Super vr Flying Jet Racer on some of the fastest death racer tracks around.

Spend your credits in the store, where you can purchase additional jets. Realize your dream with this Futuristic Fast, and action packed vr jet racing games. With this High speed racer game you will think that you are a real x jet driver of furious super furious spaceships and future cars racing. Zoom around in the fastest street racer on 2 different tracks - each difficult than the previous one - and three distinct surroundings to enhance your driving pleasure.

This game is for each and every person of any age. This space racers game has everything you need to entertain and thrill yourself. This game will allow you to test your driving skills and your survival strategy in the race. So just fasten your seat belt and go racing. Vr Flying Jet racer has been made for the lovers of speed. Drive your automatic real Super formula jets around the 3d challenging environment, spin around corners, drifting, crushing, and do as much as you can.
How to Play:
- Move your head around to look at button and hit the magnetic button from your VR Viewer
- Tilt your head to move your favorite car horizontally

Features:
- User friendly GUI and controls
- Real adventuring Environments looks like racing movies
- Stunning 3D HD quality graphics
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- Breathtaking visuals
- Different speed boosters to increase the speed
- VR based 3D Environment
- Gyro-meter based 360 degree rotation
- Compatible with virtual reality glasses such as 4DUD and Google Cardboard VR
- Crisp, Cinema like, HD visuals Different exciting racing tracks
- No time Limit, unlimited play and fun Easy to learn and drive
- Best suited music tracks for locations and races
- Excellent spaceship jet physics and controls implemented
- User friendly GUI and controls.

Some Compatible VR ( Virtual Reality ) Headsets Include:
Google Cardboard VR
Stooksy
Durovis Dive VR
Refugio 3D
VR View-Master
VRTX One
Merge VR
ANTVR
VR Smartview
ColorCross
VRTRIA
Nibiru VR
